name: PopcornTycoon
0:
”Alexa, open Popcorn Tycoon”
”Alexa, start Popcorn Tycoon”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: popcorn tycoon
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Think you have what it takes to become a Popcorn Tycoon?

Have you always dreamed of running your own business? Building an empire? Discovering the true nature of reality through the lens of popcorn-induced paranoia set to mellifluous reggae-inspired beats?

Then, my friend, Popcorn Tycoon is the game for you!

1) Pop kernels.
2) Upgrade your equipment.
3) Profit!?

Lather. Rinse. Repeat. It's that simple!

Start by popping a single popcorn kernel in a crusty old frying pan.

Soon enough you'll be able to afford ...wait for it ...a second crusty old frying pan!

After that maybe you'll unlock a microwave? A hair dryer? A popcorn cannon?

There are dozens of items to unlock!

Meet odd and fascinating characters, purchase cutting edge equipment, corner the entire market, and explore the mysteries of the Popcorn Tycoon universe to boost your popcorn production at any cost!

What are you waiting for? Say, "Alexa, enable Popcorn Tycoon!"

ACCLAIM FOR POPCORN TYCOON:

"Great way to pass the time between UFO sightings." - Hatchet Cobb, Farmer

"When am I supposed to lather and rinse the popcorn?" - Steve, Confused Customer

"Five lollipops. Yum-standing!" - Maisie McDaisy, Noted Eccentric
